name: TopRows

constructors.name: TopRows
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the Reports.TopRows class using the specified parameters.

params.name: direction
params.description: The number of rows returned in the report. The sort order of the report rows.

constructors.name: TopRows
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the Reports.TopRows class. You can then set values by using the class’s set methods.

methods.name: getDirection
methods.description: Returns the sort order of the report rows.

methods.name: getRowLimit
methods.description: Returns the maximum number of rows shown in the report.

methods.name: setDirection
methods.description: Sets the sort order of the report’s rows.

methods.name: setDirection
methods.description: Sets the sort order of the report’s rows.

methods.name: setRowLimit
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of rows included in the report.

description: Contains methods and constructors for working with information about a row limit filter.
